Pre-Game Insights: Denmark will look to build on a 2-0 win over Switzerland and are seen as favourites to win against Serbia.
Serbia, despite a strong lineup, are not regarded as good travellers and may struggle at Parken Stadium.
Others: Highlighted Player: Predrag Rajkovic, a Serbian goalkeeper playing for Stade Reims.
Highlighted Team: Denmark's national team, with historical achievements and key players.
